newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-REGGIANA-MILAN CUP MATCH MOVED AFTER QUAKE.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-REGGIANA-MILAN CUP MATCH MOVED AFTER QUAKE.

text.p: The Italian Cup tie between Reggiana and AC Milan will be played at Cremona, 70 kms from Reggio Emilia, because technicians are still determining if the Reggio stadium was damaged in an earthquake last week.
Officials said the tests at the stadium would not be completed before Wednesday's third round match.
The earthquake, which registered 4.8 on the Richter scale, struck northern Italy a week ago, dislodging plaster and cornices from buildings and causing dozens of minor injuries.
